meanings.definition: A plant belonging to the group of cycadophytes.
meanings.sent1: The cycadophyte stood tall in the garden, its unique leaves catching the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: Many scientists study the ancient cycadophyte to learn more about prehistoric plant life.
meanings.sent3: The cycadophyte decided to throw a party for all the other plants in the forest.
meanings.sent4: In the land of the cycadophytes, the tallest one was known as the king of the forest.
meanings.sent5: The cycadophyte's roots reached deep into the earth, anchoring it firmly in place.

meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of cycadophytes.
meanings.sent1: The cycadophyte leaves had a distinct shape that set them apart from other plants.
meanings.sent2: The researcher's findings provided valuable insights into the cycadophyte ecosystem.
meanings.sent3: The cycadophyte fashion trend took the botanical world by storm.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as strong and enduring as a cycadophyte in the desert.
meanings.sent5: The garden was filled with a symphony of colors, each one as vibrant as a cycadophyte bloom.
